properties.name: Sukiyabashi Jiro
properties.description: A renowned sushi restaurant in Tokyo known for its Michelin stars and the subject of the documentary 'Jiro Dreams of Sushi'.
properties.message: Considered one of the finest sushi restaurants in the world, often requiring reservations well in advance.

properties.name: Kyo Aji
properties.description: One of the most exclusive kaiseki restaurants in Tokyo.
properties.message: Known for its traditional and meticulously prepared Japanese dishes, which reflect the changing seasons.

properties.name: Dotonbori
properties.description: A vibrant and colorful dining and entertainment district in Osaka, famous for its street food including takoyaki and okonomiyaki.
properties.message: A must-visit for food enthusiasts looking for a lively atmosphere and a taste of local flavors.

properties.name: Nishiki Market
properties.description: Known as 'Kyoto's Kitchen', this bustling market specializes in all things food related, including fresh seafood, produce, and local specialties like Kyoto vegetables.
properties.message: A perfect spot to explore traditional Japanese culinary culture with an opportunity to try various street food and local dishes.

properties.name: Hakata Ramen Yatai
properties.description: A famous ramen stall area in Fukuoka, where visitors can enjoy Hakata ramen, known for its rich pork-broth.
properties.message: Ideal for experiencing a casual and authentic dining atmosphere late into the night.
